metadata.title: JODC Currents (includes ADCP)

creators.name: Oceanographic Department, Japan Oceanographic Data Center (JODC)

metadata.description:
This file contains current data by using ship drift, GEK, ADCP and Drifting buoy.  Drifiting buoy position was calculated by interpolation position from two data.  

[ A TCODE project ]
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Archive and service as National Oceanographic Data Center in Japan.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: As Needed
